mapper.select: select s.good_id, g.good_name, sum(s.initial_goods*g.price) as total_sales #这里先用sales来存储数量，后面在service类直接重写 from storage s join goods g on s.good_id = g.id where s.date between #{beginDate} and #{endDate} group by s.good_id order by total_sales desc

select s.market_id, m.market_name, sum(s.initial_goods*g.price) as total_sales from storage s join supermarket m on market_id = m.id join goods g on s.good_id = g.id where s.date between #{beginDate} and #{endDate} group by s.market_id order by total_sales desc

select MONTH(s.date) as month, sum(s.initial_goods*g.price) as month_sales from storage s inner join goods g on s.good_id = g.id WHERE
s.good_id = #{goodId} and
s.date between #{beginDate} and #{endDate} group by MONTH(s.date)

select market_id, supermarket.market_name, sum(initial_goods*g.price) as month_sales from storage s inner join goods g on s.good_id = g.id inner join supermarket on supermarket.id = s.market_id where s.date between #{beginDate} and #{endDate} group by s.market_id order by s.market_id
select good_id, g.good_name, sum(initial_goods*price) from storage s inner join goods g on s.good_id = g.id where s.date between #{beginDate} and #{endDate} group by good_id order by good_id
